title: "Financial Services Union and Permanent TSB agree union recognition for managers"
excerpt: "The Financial Services Union (FSU) and Permanent TSB have agreed union recognition and collective bargaining for managers working for the lender. The union said the agreement was the beginning of new relationship with Permanent TSB."
